products.title: Products
products.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
products.name: Name

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Manage product categories to organize your store
categories.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
categories.delete_warning: Deleting a category can affect products
categories.delete_warning_desc: This category may be associated with products. Deleting it could impact how these products are categorized.
categories.delete_cascade_warning: Products associated with this category will remain but will no longer be linked to any category.
categories.name: Name
categories.no_description: No description provided for this category
categories.name_tooltip: Name of the category as it will appear to customers
categories.slug_info: Used in URLs. Auto-generated from name if left empty
categories.description_tooltip: A detailed description of the category
categories.display_order_tooltip: Determines the order in which categories appear
categories.status_tooltip: Only active categories will be visible on the site
categories.products_description: These statistics show the performance of products associated with this category.
categories.help_slug_text: Slugs are used in URLs to identify this category. Use only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.
categories.help_parent_text: Setting a parent category creates a hierarchy. Customers can navigate through categories to find products.
categories.help_display_text: Lower values appear first. Use this to control the order categories appear in menus and listings.

regions.title: Regions
regions.description: Manage geographical regions for your product collections
regions.info_tooltip: Regions help categorize products by geographical area
regions.add_description: Create a new region for your products
regions.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this region?
regions.delete_warning: Deleting a region can affect products
regions.delete_warning_desc: This region may be associated with products. Deleting it could impact how these products are categorized.
regions.delete_cascade_warning: Products associated with this region will remain but will no longer be linked to any region.
regions.name: Name
regions.no_description: No description provided for this region
regions.name_tooltip: Name of the geographical region (e.g., 'Northern Vietnam')
regions.slug_info: Used in URLs. Auto-generated from name if left empty
regions.description_tooltip: A detailed description of the region
regions.status_tooltip: Only active regions will be visible on the site
regions.danger_description: Actions in this section can't be undone
regions.side_info_1_desc: Regions represent geographical areas in Vietnam. Each product can be associated with a region to organize your catalog.
regions.side_info_2_desc: Use descriptive names, high-quality images, and detailed descriptions for optimal SEO and user experience.
regions.tips_1: Use high-quality images that represent the region well
regions.tips_2: Keep the slug simple and descriptive for better SEO
regions.tips_3: Include key attractions in the description
regions.stats_description: These statistics show the performance of products associated with this region.
regions.export_description: Export this region's data in various formats for reporting or backup purposes.

confirm_leave.title: Unsaved Changes
confirm_leave.message: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

danger_zone_description: Actions in this section cannot be undone

validation.slug_format: Slug must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
validation.image_only: You can only upload image files!
